ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok  .. Hmm I m Thinking because of the Different scenarios there can be only one common thread . Exposure  YES, but no to the creature, but the
ygData.messageBody:
Snicker wrote:

> From: Snicker <snicker@...>
>
> At 03:04 AM 5/11/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: "Frank Varbel" <fvarbel1@...>
> >
> >i think you can train in any language at your guild once you have been
> >exposed to it. for example i bet you spent some time in blackburrow before
> >you went and checked. and now you can train in gnoll.
>
> Nope nope and more nope.
>
> When I reached 10th level Bard, having never left the continent of Faydwer,
> I suddenly discovered Gnoll as a language option. Unless I'm greatly
> mistaken, there are no Gnolls on the entire continent. And if there are,
> well, I've missed them.
>
> It's not exposure - it's class/level related.
>
> Talies on Bristlebane
> http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
>

Ok .. Hmm I'm Thinking because of the Different scenarios there can be only one common thread . Exposure YES,
but no to the creature, but the language???? Or Different creatures Use a Group of languages So there are ones In
Odus That would activate Gnoll maybe kerrians ..??




--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
